predicate.note: Frames file for 'sublimate' based on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry.

roleset.name: To have a purifying, ennobling effect; to change from solid to gas or vice versa

role.descr: final state of arg 1, result after sublimation

example.name: Args 1 and 4 only
example.text: ...The two basic sentiments of my childhood which stayed with me well into adolescense, are those of a profound eroticism, at first sublimated *none* in a great religious faith, and a permanent consciousness of death.
